LanguageData.OE_AzuliumHigh.label: azulium effect
LanguageData.OE_AzuliumHigh.description: Active anti-psychotic azulium compounds in the bloodstream, helps control extreme mental breaks and impulsive behaviour.
LanguageData.OE_AzuliumHigh.stages.weak.label: weak
LanguageData.OE_AzuliumHigh.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.OE_AzuliumHigh.stages.strong.label: strong
LanguageData.OE_TimbiumHigh.label: timbium effect
LanguageData.OE_TimbiumHigh.description: Active timbium in the bloodstream. Improves mobility, speed of work and learning.
LanguageData.OE_TimbiumHigh.stages.weak.label: weak
LanguageData.OE_TimbiumHigh.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.OE_TimbiumHigh.stages.strong.label: strong
LanguageData.OE_TimbiumAddiction.label: timbium addiction
LanguageData.OE_GarganadolHigh.label: garganadol effect
LanguageData.OE_GarganadolHigh.description: Garganadol in the bloodstream. Disables need: Food.
LanguageData.OE_GarganadolAddiction.label: garganadol need
LanguageData.OE_GarganadolAddiction.description: Garganadol mechanites in the body. Garganadol mechanites decohere over time; only regular doses of fresh garganadol can prevent this process.\n\nWithout garganadol, the mechanite decoherence will reach a critical state, causing the victim die in 7 days.
LanguageData.OE_CofagradolHigh.label: cofagradol effect
LanguageData.OE_CofagradolHigh.description: Cofagradol in the bloodstream. Disables need: Rest.
LanguageData.OE_CofagradolAddiction.label: cofagradol need
LanguageData.OE_CofagradolAddiction.description: Cofagradol mechanites in the body. Cofagradol mechanites decohere over time; only regular doses of fresh cofagradol can prevent this process.\n\nWithout cofagradol, the mechanite decoherence will reach a critical state, causing the victim die in 7 days.
LanguageData.OE_CressadolHigh.label: cressadol effect
LanguageData.OE_CressadolHigh.description: Cressadol in the bloodstream. Disables need: Recreation.
LanguageData.OE_CressadolAddiction.label: cressadol need
LanguageData.OE_CressadolAddiction.description: Cressadol mechanites in the body. Cressadol mechanites decohere over time; only regular doses of fresh cressadol can prevent this process.\n\nWithout cressadol, the mechanite decoherence will reach a critical state, causing the victim die in 7 days.
LanguageData.OE_CressadolAddiction.stages.unmet.label: unmet

LanguageData.OE_FlorgadolAddiction.description: Florgadol mechanites in the body. Florgadol mechanites decohere over time; only regular doses of fresh florgadol can prevent this process.\n\nWithout florgadol, the mechanite decoherence will reach a critical state, causing the victim die in 7 days.
LanguageData.OE_FlorgadolAddiction.stages.unmet.label: unmet
